how_to_scan.title: How to Scan an AR Code?
how_to_scan.lead: An AR Code is designed to be universally rendered without any app on all mobile devices, including AR/VR headsets.
how_to_scan.description: Immersive AR rendering is supported on iOS, Android OS, visionOS, and Meta Horizon OS. Even older Android devices will have access to immersive WebAR thanks to our low-power SLAM rendering technology. Additionally, AR Codes support advanced AR and AI features through our solutions such as AR Face Filters and AI Codes, enhancing AR experiences across a wide range of compatible smartphone devices.

FAQSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQSection.subtitle: Everything you need to know about AR Code

questions.q: Do customers need to download an app?
questions.a: No! AR Code works directly in the phone's camera app. Customers simply scan the QR code and the AR experience launches instantly in their browser. No downloads, no friction.
From start to finish, it takes 5-7 days. You send us photos of your dishes, we create the 3D models, and deliver your custom QR codes ready to print.

questions.q: What if I update my menu?
questions.a: Just contact us! We'll update the 3D models for you. The first 30 days of updates are free, and after that we offer affordable update packages.

questions.q: Does it work on all phones?
questions.a: Yes! AR Code works on iOS 11+, Android 7+, and all modern smartphones. We support 99% of devices your customers use.
Pricing starts at $99 for 5 QR codes. We offer packages for different venue sizes. Check our pricing page for full details. No subscriptionsâ€”just a one-time payment.

FAQ.title: FAQ | Everything You Need to Know
FAQ.description: Find answers to technical requirements, device compatibility, and how to get started with AR menus. All your questions about TRA 3D answered here.

header.title: Common <highlight>Questions</highlight>
header.subtitle: Find answers to technical requirements, pricing, and how TRA 3D can skyrocket your conversion rates.

FAQ.no_results: No matches found for your search.

cta.title: Still have reservations?
cta.subtitle: Speak directly with our AR specialists. We'll help you understand if TRA 3D is right for your venue.

questions.q: Do customers need to download an app?
questions.a: Absolutely not. One of TRA 3D's core strengths is its frictionless experience. Customers simply scan a QR code with their native smartphone camera, and the AR experience launches instantly in their mobile browser (Safari, Chrome, etc.).

questions.q: What is TRA 3D and how does it help my business?
questions.a: TRA 3D is an AR Commerce platform designed to bridge the gap between digital menus and physical reality. We turn your 2D photos into high-fidelity 3D models that customers can project onto their tables, leading to a 25-40% increase in order value and higher engagement.

questions.q: How do I get my QR codes?
questions.a: Once you choose a plan, you upload your menu photos to our portal. Our team (or AI, depending on your tier) creates the 3D models. We then provide you with high-resolution QR codes that you can print on table tents, menus, or posters.

questions.q: Which devices are compatible with TRA 3D?
questions.a: TRA 3D supports AR Quick Look on iOS (iPhone/iPad) and Scene Viewer on Android. This covers over 95% of modern smartphones released in the last 4-5 years.

questions.q: Can I integrate this with my existing POS system?
questions.a: Our Enterprise plan offers robust API access and webhooks, allowing you to sync AR views with inventory and order placement. For smaller plans, the codes are independent and work alongside any existing setup.

questions.q: What format of photos do I need to provide?
questions.a: Standard high-resolution mobile photos of your dishes/products from 3-4 different angles are sufficient. For the best results, we recommend photos taken in natural lighting without busy backgrounds.
Standard plans are available on month-to-month terms. Yearly subscriptions offer a 20% discount but are paid upfront. You can upgrade or downgrade at any time.

questions.q: What kind of support is provided?
questions.a: Starter plans include standard email support. Professional and Enterprise plans benefit from priority WhatsApp support and a dedicated account manager to ensure your AR menu is a success.

Contact.title: Contact Us | Start Your AR Project
Contact.description: Get in touch with TRA 3D experts today. Whether you need a custom AR menu for your restaurant or 3D visualization for retail, we're here to help.

header.title: Let's build your <highlight>AR Menu</highlight>
header.subtitle: Fill out the form below or reach out directly via WhatsApp for a faster response.

success.title: You're on the list!
success.subtitle: We've received your request. One of our AR specialists will reach out within 2 hours to schedule your tailored demo.

visual.title: See your menu come to life with <primary>TRA 3D</primary>
visual.subtitle: Book a 15-minute tailored demo where weâ€™ll show you exactly how AR will look at your venue and project your potential ROI.

questions.q: What happens after I request a demo?
questions.a: A TRA 3D specialist will review your venue details and email you within 2 hours to pick a time. During the call, we'll show you a live AR prototype using items from your category and project your potential ROI.

questions.q: Do I need to send professional photographs?
questions.a: Standard smartphone photos work perfectly. We leverage AI-assisted photogrammetry to turn your photos into high-fidelity 3D models.

questions.q: How long is the typical setup process?
questions.a: Enterprise clients typically go live in 5-7 business days. This includes model creation, QR generation, and quality assurance.

questions.q: Is there a monthly subscription fee?
questions.a: No, we believe in transparent, one-time pricing for the assets. You own the 3D models and the forever-active QR codes.
